title: Trump Derides Schumer For ‘Fake Tears’ On Immigration Order
text:
Twitter Bares Fangs After Director Likens Ivanka Trump To A Dog 
Schumer also said he would seek to have a Senate vote on repealing the order. 
He also suggested that Senate Democrats might seek to slow down the confirmations of Trump’s Cabinet appointees as a reprisal for the order. 
“I’m going to ask for a delay, whether [Senate Majority Leader Mitch] McConnell grants it, you know, they run the senate,” Schumer said. “I think we’re going to ask about it for just about every one.” 
Trump said Monday that Democrats were playing politics with his appointees. 
“In terms of what they’re being put through in the Senate. Jeff Sessions they made him wait an extra week and they did that only for political reasons. They just made him wait. I said, ‘Why did they do that?’ Just politics,” Trump said. 
During a brief period on Monday after his meeting with business leaders, Trump noted that Democrats are angry over his executive order, but lacked any concern when Americans had trouble finding jobs. 
“I say where was the outrage of the Democrats when all of our companies were fleeing to Mexico and to other places far away and leaving jobs behind? Now they are all coming back. They are coming back by big numbers, bigger numbers than people have seen,” Trump said. 
Trump spokesman Stephen Miller said the backlash from Schumer and other Democrats was inevitable. 
“I think anytime you do anything hugely successful, that challenges a failed orthodoxy , you’re going to see protests,” Miller said on CBS. “In fact, if nobody is disagreeing with what you are doing, then you’re probably not doing anything that really matters in the scheme of things.” What do you think?
